concept.title: Caution:
concept.shortdesc: Please read the following cautions before setting up your device:

ul.li: Keep the device 5-10 inches away from other items.
Avoid placing the device near any heat source.
Unplug the device if it is left unused for a long period of time.
Do not place any items on top of the device.
If the device is not working, please have a qualified technician repair it.
